amendment.description: Amendment directs the U.S. Department of Transportation to study methods of inventorying roadside highway safety hardware devices (i.e. guardrails) for the purpose of improving in-service evaluation of these devices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 114-325 to direct the U.S. Department of Transportation to study methods of inventorying roadside highway safety hardware devices (i.e. guardrails) for the purpose of improving in-service evaluation of these devices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier to the Rules amendment (A001).
